subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* Not to be confused with {{zh-l|係|hai6|to be}}.
* While Mandarin {{zh-l|在}} can be used by itself as a verb ({{zh-l|[[他]][[現在]][[不]][[在]]}} "he is not here right now"), Cantonese must use {{zh-l|喺度}} ({{zh-l|[[佢]][[而家]][[唔]][[喺度]]}} "he is not here right now"). {{attention|zh|can this wording be improved?}}
